description_info.description: In Central Perk, Rachel comforting her boss, Terry. She wants money in advance for Thanksgiving. Terry refuses it. Rachel and Terry are talking with the bar inbetween them. Rachel walks backwards asking customers for coffee to prove her ability. All people raise their hands.
Rachel stands by the bar facing Terry.
Terry holds Rachel's hands and explains why he refuses her ask.

qa.question: Where is Rachel?
qa.wrong_answer2: In a car.

qa.question: Who is talking with Rachel?
qa.wrong_answer2: Chandler.

qa.question: What is Rachel asking for?
qa.answer: Rachel is asking if she can get paid in advance.
qa.wrong_answer1: Rachel is asking Terry's phone number.
qa.wrong_answer2: Rachel is aksing for more work.
qa.wrong_answer3: Rachel is asking for more information about work.
qa.wrong_answer4: Rachel is asking for how to make coffee.

description_info.description: In Central Perk, Rachel is approaching one of regular customers for asking his tips in advance. He leaves with hearing Rachel saying sorry to him. Rachel picks up the tips on the table and leaves. Monica enters with a bag. Monica takes off her coat and sits down on the edge of sofa. Monica lets Ross know about their parents absent on Thanksgiving. Ross goes to the back to call his mother to check news from Monica. Joey eners ands sits on the chair. Phoebe and Chandler are sitting on the sofa, all four Joey, Monica, and Phoebe are talking together. Joey has a make-up on. Rachel joins and sits on the other edge of sofa.
In Central Perk, Rachel is approaching one of regular customers for asking his tips in advance.
Monica takes off her coat and sits down on the edge of sofa.

qa.wrong_answer2: Ross.

qa.wrong_answer2: Monica will marry.

qa.answer: Because he wants to check that their parents leave for Thanksgiving.
qa.wrong_answer1: Because he wants to go to the toilet.
qa.wrong_answer2: Because he doesn't want to talk with friends.
qa.wrong_answer3: Because he wants to drink water.
qa.wrong_answer4: Because he wants to order food.

description_info.description: Joey on a chair, Rachel and Monica on the edge of sofa, Chandler and Phoebe on the sofa. All friends are talking together. Ross disappointedly comes back and sits on the sofa alone. All friends are talking. Monica is thinking to have Thanksgiving with friends and inviting them. Ross leaves to go to his ex-wife's house. At Carole's house, Susan opens the door and greets Ross.
Chandler and Phoebe are sitting on the sofa. On the edge of both sides of it, Monica and Rachel are sitting down.
Susan, Ross's ex-wife's girlfriend, greets Ross at home and lets him inside.

qa.wrong_answer2: Monica.

description_info.description: Ross comes in and explains that he visits for the skull that Carole borrowed from him. Both of them browse the apartment and talk together. Ross walks towards the bookcase and looks around. Susan goes to the TV and looks around. Ross walks around and picks up a book, finding that Susan reads a book to the baby.
Ross comes in the house and finds that Carole is not at home.
Susan and Ross are talking together and trying to find out a skull.

qa.answer: Because Ross gets back a skull.

qa.wrong_answer4: Because Ross wants to look around the house.

qa.wrong_answer4: Susan prepares tea instead of coffee for the baby.

description_info.description: At home, Ross talks to his friends about his ideas, sitting at the kitchen table. Monica and Phoebe are sorting out food and preparing food for Thanksgiving. Monica moves the shopping bag. Phoebe listens to Ross's opinion and talks about her ideas with turkey. Chandler sitting. on the sofa stands up and approaches the table. Rachel enters and sits on the sofa disappointedly. Monica, Chandler, and Phoebe stand behind her. Monica gives Rachel her mail and makes her open them up. Rachel reluctatnly opens and finds that it is money for her flight. Rachel is so excited because now she can go skiing with her family.   She hugs Monica and goes to the table where Ross is sitting.
Chandler is sitting on the back of sofa looking at the kitchen.
Rachel comes into the house disappointedly.

description_info.description: Monica gives a bag of food to Chandler. All is talking in the livingroom. When Rachel asks why he gets such food, not tranditional food, Chandler tells her his story. Others are bored with it, but Rachel carefully listens to him. In the subway station, Joey finds a beautiful woman that he met before in a studio. He sits down with her and starts talking.
Monica gives food to Chandler which makes him happy.
Chandler explains why he get to hate Thanksgiving to Rachel.

description_info.description: In the subway station, Joey and a beautiful woman are talking together, sitting on the bench. The talking goes well and the both stands up. The woman suddenly leaves hurriedly, looking over Joey's shoulders. Joey turns around and sees a poster on the wall saying that he has VD, a sexually transmitted disease. Shocked, Joey goes up the stairs and looks at it closely. Discouraged, Joey leans against the wall on his back. A variety of scenes are shown with the poster displayed all over New York City.
Joey and a beautiful woman that he is hitting on are sitting on the bench together.
Joey finds that a poster with his face is displayed in New York City.

qa.question: Where is Joey?
qa.wrong_answer2: Joey is in a theater.

qa.question: What does Joey feel about the woman he meets in the subway?
qa.answer: Joey is interested in the woman.
qa.wrong_answer2: Joey is disgusted by the woman.
qa.wrong_answer4: Joey is panicked by the woman.

qa.question: Why does the woman leave Joey suddenly?
qa.answer: Because the woman finds the poster saying that Joey has VD.
qa.wrong_answer1: Because the woman is bored with Joey.
qa.wrong_answer2: Because the woman finds Joey stoopid.
qa.wrong_answer3: Because the woman has a phone call.
qa.wrong_answer4: Because the woman has a boyfriend.

description_info.description: Joey comes into the caf√© and finds that his friends all gather around the sofa and laughs at his poster. Joey stands and looks at his friends. A varitey of scenes are shown that Joey's poster is display all over the city. Joey is upset and comes back home. Monica and Phoebe are preparing food together; Monica is chopping parsely and Phoebe is chopping carrots on the board. The scenes show Underdog, a cartoon character, in an inflatable balloon with a group of people marching. Chandler is in the doorway. Monica is busy around the kitchen preparing food and Phoebe is helping her. Rachel comes in with motion of skiing.
Joey comes into the caf√©, finds that his friends all see the poster and laughs at it.
Scenes are shown with inflatable dog marching down the street.

qa.wrong_answer3: The friends are laughing at TV program.
qa.wrong_answer4: The friends are laughing at Rachel for her funny clothes.

qa.answer: Monica is preparing food for Thanksgiving.

qa.question: Who is excited about skiing?
qa.wrong_answer2: Ross.

description_info.description: Chandler is in the doorway and Phoebe approaches him with a pumpkin pie to tease him. Joey is right behind Phoebe. Annoyed by her, Chandler leaves the house. Joey is sitting down and whining up for his faviorite food in Thanksgiving, tater tots, so Monica decides to make it for him. Ross leaves with a coat to go to his ex-wife. Ross reaches food and Monica slaps his hand away. After Ross left, Monica by the kitchen table tastes food and goes to Phoebe to check potatoes. She checks them and realizes that Phoebe stirred them, which is not made as planned. Phoebe and Monica are standing and talking in the kitchen. With Phoebe's whining, Monica kicks her out from the kitchen and decides to make three types of potatoes.
Joey is in the kitchen and talking to Monica. Joey is whining up for his favorite food, tater tots.
Phoebe is helping Monica in the kitchen. Monica is staning by the kitchen table to prepare food for Thanksgiving.

description_info.description: Rachel comes out of the room with her ski equipment. Carelessly, Rachel walks around the livingroom and hits things. She drops ornaments in the livingroom and hits Joey, turning around. Monica is in sink. Phoebe is standing by the kitchen table. Suddenly, Chandler runs into the house delivering the event about an inflatable dog marching on the street. All leaves the house without keys and Monica mentions keys. Rachel shuts the door, thinking Monica has them. In Carole's house, Ross is looking at Carole's belly and trying to talk to it, expecting that the baby can hear him. Carole is comfortably leaning on the sofa and Ross is sitting next to her. Ross is not comfortable with the idea of talking to the belly. He makes his position comfortable on the sofa. Carole tries to stop him by mentioning Susan, but she encourages him instead. Ross talks to her belly straightaway.
Rachel comes out of her room and walks to the door through the livingroom with her ski equipment.
Ross is at Carole's house and tries to talk to the baby by talking to her baby.

description_info.description: On the hallway, Joey, Chandler, Rachel, Monica, and Phoebe coming together from the roof. They are talking and walking towards the door. All stands up in front of the door and sees each other. Monica stands and asks who has keys. Rachel and Monica start arguing about why nobody has keys. She is panicked as the oven is on. Chandler and Joey have spare keys, so Joey goes into their house to get them.

description_info.description: In Carole's house, Ross is talking to the baby and Carole is sitting on the sofa, reading a book. Susan comes into the house which makes Ross start singing. As he sings, suddenly Carole and Ross feel the baby's movement. They are surprised and stopped for a moment, seeing each other. With expectation, Carole, Ross, and Susan all touch Carole's stomach to feel the movement and Ross sings. Just then, they feel the movement and scream for enjoyment.
Ross is talking to the baby over Carole's stomach.
Ross, Susan, and Carole all expect the baby's movement by touching Carole's stomach.

description_info.description: Joey is hunkering down in front of the door and Chandler is holding a tray full of keys. Phoebe, Rachel, and Monica are in the hallway waiting for Joey to open up the door. Joey keeps changing the keys from the tray and trying on every one of them. Monica is impatient and runs to him. Rachel goes to Chandler and grabs him by the shirt. Rachel puts anger out on Chandler. Monica and Rachel argue again and Phoebe steps in to stop them. Monica is furious as she feels like doing everything from cooking to picking up keys and nobody cares her. Just then, Joey opens the door and everyone dashes into the house.
Monica, Phoebe, and Rachel are standing in the hallway.
Joey and Chandler are trying to open the door with spare keys.

description_info.description: The apartment is full of smoke. In the kitchen, Monica takes the turkey from the oven and checks the pots. She finds that all food is no use. Ross comes in, singing. Monica takes anger out on Ross by picking up the pan of badly burnt potatoes.  In the livingroom, Rachel just hangs up the phone and shouts at the friends. Joey starts shouting at each other. By looking at the friends fighting, Chandler talks to himself. As time passes, all becomes lethargic and sits down around the livingroom. Phoebe suddenly draws attention by talking to the friends about the neighbor, walking to the windows.
Smoke fills the apartment. Monica hurriedly enters the kitchen and checks food.
Rachel hangs up the phone and shouts at the friends that her plane already left.

At the dining table, all sits around and Chandler stands up like a host. He passes aroound grilled cheese sandwiches, not so traditional food for Thanksgiving. Monica and Joey split the sandwich together.
